Detailed Description

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ExifByteOrder

Which byte order to use.

Enumerator:
EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_MOTOROLA 

Big-endian byte order.

EXIF_BYTE_ORDER_INTEL 

Little-endian byte order.
